website_summaries.verdict: Extra-wide ab roller offers great stability and built-in resistance. Its durable construction makes this a perennial bestseller.
pros: Ergonomic hand grips are angled to provide resistance in arms and core
Removable handles make storage and portability a snap
cons: Some models may leak a black, oily substance after use
Others may have spring issues over time which diminish tension and resistance

website_summaries.verdict: A higher-end ab roller with plenty of extras that beginners will find helpful.
pros: Built-in resistance and ergonomic handles maximize results
Interior kinetic engine uses a carbon steel spring to provide resistance and amplify workout
Ultra-wide wheel tread offers stability during oblique workout
Angled grips activate arm and core muscles
Includes high-density foam kneepad for superior comfort
cons: Spring-assisted return helps beginners, but takes away from the work your body does

customer_reviews.title: Roll back issue, minimum lat workout
customer_reviews.text: This roller falls short when compare to my 10+ years old. 1st, roll back issue others have mentioned. Brand new out of box, after just 12 reps the roll back point is short by 8 inches from the start point. You can't roll back pass that point. The more reps you do, the greater the gap gets. 2nd, very minimum lat workout. This is due to the handles' position, the further they are away from the center the more lat workout you'll get out of it. See photo, how Ab Slide has much longer handlebar. This one is going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! On month 2 and I see huge results!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LizYvonne

customer_reviews.title: 6 Weeks Later - Core Strength and Ab Definition!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been pretty inactive for about 6 months, and all at the same time, I started eating healthy, working out 4-5 times per week, and incorporating home ab workouts with the Ab Carver Pro. I've used it about 3-4 times per week for the past 6 weeks and I have noticed a drastic improvement in my core strength and ab definition. Now, I also do occasional ab workouts at the gym with other exercise routines, but this has been a great supplemental tool to work on my core. I would recommend to anyone...especially if you're tired of doing sit-ups!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent core exercise
customer_reviews.text: I workout 5x /wk, everytime i am just too tired to do abs. I have not work on my abs for very very long time. Finally, found this abs roller that solve my problem. Everyday 1hour before bed I hit 25reps x 5sets total time is about 25mins, actual work time 6mins. Walaaaa n so i have my 4 packs after 1month. Highly recommended for those trying to work on core. I think you can get this at half the price else where but i am not sure of the authenticity. I just trust amazon as a brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eggrollking

customer_reviews.title: It works and is very convenient...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece of exercise equipment that really shows results. Use this during commercials while you watch television and pop out 2-3 at first and 15-25 reps (after 10-14 days or more) as your body responds. I do not find any undo strain on my lower back like might happen with the onslaught of fatigue and non-"assisted" equipment like this from the past (the old one-wheel and two simple handles type). This is a great anaerobic exercise you can do in your living room that really burns calories and builds trunk and up body muscles.
customer_reviews.author: L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. People should know they still need to do other workouts along with something like this or anything else and that it's not going to give them miracle abs just using this but it gives your stomach muscles a good workout and you will feel a big difference especially if you do manual labor. One thing to make sure is that you start off slow and build up strength in that area before trying to extend fully or you might hurt yourself. Product itself feels easy to use as long as you don't push too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Realview

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fake one
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that I received a fake item. It’s a copy. Knee pad is cheap made and the machine too. I’m shocked!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.G'dale

customer_reviews.title: Now after losing the 20 pounds (along with a good diet and workout routine) I am able to do ...
customer_reviews.text: So obviously the ab carver didn't get me a 6 pack. But what it did do was strengthen my core. I was 20 pounds overweight when I started using this. I started out only doing 3-4 per set. Now after losing the 20 pounds (along with a good diet and workout routine) I am able to do at least 15 per set. The point is, this really helped me trim some body fat to where I started gaining much more confidence and began to do other core workouts along with this. I love this, and I use it almost 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really did not like this at all
customer_reviews.text: I really, really did not like this at all. It's way too chunky/large, yet it feels cheap. I've used many other ab rollers that roll much smoother, this one skips a beat when you roll it. Not sure if my particular one was damaged, but it definitely does not roll smoothly. I don't use anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great ab workout
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out with a personal trainer for 3 months and have been doing a lot of core workouts and haven't had a good burn. I tried this ab carver yesterday and today my abs are sore, a good sore. I had a baby 7 months and was having difficulty targeting my core muscles. I am happy I purchased the ab carver because finally I can feel a burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I used a single barbell with sand weights in the center and grips on the side... pretty low-tech, but it worked fine. I had hoped this would be a significant improvement -- especially given the springs inside that I hoped would create some tension. The hand grips are comfortable, and the wide body is stable -- especially on carpet. It's well made, but it's not particularly exceptional. I use it frequently, but it's only a few steps up from your basic wheel on a stick.
customer_reviews.author: Ramze

customer_reviews.title: would be perfect. Just as you don't hold a plank and ...
customer_reviews.text: There is room for improvement with many of these ab rollers - first, it's not properly designed for alignment with your shoulder width, which means when you roll out your shoulders are put in an unsafe position and there much pressure on the wrists as well. If it was set wider, would be perfect. Just as you don't hold a plank and do mountain climbers with your hands this close together you shouldn't be grasping something this narrow for ab work. Otherwise, it does make you sore but I feel it more in lats and triceps more than my abs.
customer_reviews.author: perralove

customer_reviews.title: I no longer look like I'm 5 months pregnant when I eat a full ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for about 3 weeks off and on. I do about 30 roll workouts a day. It has significantly helped with my stomach bloating. I no longer look like I'm 5 months pregnant when I eat a full meal. It looks flatter, but there is still fat there. I will update in another few months. Overall, I think it works like it should for a beginner. It's the first time in years I have tried to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to workout/exercise routine but not a replacement
customer_reviews.text: No such thing as a "magic bullet" when it comes to fitness and healthy living. That being said, incorporating this device into your workouts is a good idea in my opinion. GO TO THE WEBSITE and READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!!!!!! You can hurt yourself if you buy this thinking "I'll have 6 pack abs in no time with this thing!" Nope. As I said, this device is an excellent ADDITION, not a replacement for proper eating and other exercises. It really works your abdominal muscles. I like the spring inside that gives resistance to the forward motion and assists with the return motion. It also comes with knee pads that are needed to keep from hurting your knees while using it.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I weight 200 pounds and don't feel uncomfortable using this. The floor mat it comes with is a huge plus and a big reason why I bought this model over others. This is great if you are just trying to stay tone or you have 20 to 30 pounds to lose like myself. At first you won't be extending all the way as this is a difficult thing to do even for really fit people. After spending hundreds of dollars on an equipment this one is honestly the most effective one I own
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful/Painful
customer_reviews.text: Great for core work. I've been using this and a less expensive non-spring roller and I prefer this roller much more. I've used a couple of these and the springs don't age well, but it's still usable after a couple years and still better than the cheaper models in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory O. Passano

customer_reviews.title: Great product ( Roll back issue as said here already)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Assistance on the Way Back helps minimizing pressure on the lower back. Cons: The roll back mechanism need some improvement. You start in the right position and after 5/7 reps you are 5cm in front of the starting position (it is a bit annoying to adjust it all the time). It is a great product that does the job but needs some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like the wide base wheel. I don't care for the roller to stop in a certain place where you first set it (there's no reason for it). I will probably buy a different (cheaper) product with a narrower wheel and not spring activated (for assistance) once I get into shape. This seems more like a product for beginners (more support and control from a wider wheel, spring assistance, stops a certain location).
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful OUCH
customer_reviews.text: Okay I am not one for gimmicks and was hesitant to buy something like this = I was wrong, this one piece of equipment is the best at home tool needed for fitness (don't forget your weights and resistance bands). Day 1: probably 3 reps of 10 Day 2: Oh wow did my abs feel it, they were sore in a good way. Keeping up with routine daily. I will update in a month the results. But so far I feel it working, so I RECOMMEND TRYING THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: A great tool allowing to keep ABS toned. Works perfectly well on the hard floor, not so well on a thick carpet. I enjoy using it, it keeps me in shape. The assembly takes a few seconds. Some reviewers complained about getting a knockoff version, but as you can see from the first photo, it's an actual "Perfect Fitness" AB Carver. Hope it brings some clarification.
customer_reviews.author: Elman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had a strained abdominal muscle. My doctor did some scans just to be sure it wasn’t more serious. Don’t know why I thought this would help. But It did. I started slow and easy keeping good form. I already had decent definition of my abdominals but wanted to stop the usual ab workouts I’d been doing and this really surprised me, it works. Feels a bit ‘not solid’ if that makes sense but I’ve been using it since April 2018 3x week and it still works great and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: The mechanics inside have broken (the spring) and the device is no longer working. I’ve only used it for a short period of time. Really disappointed as I was hoping to use this as a regular part of my workout.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cool and effective piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this device it was a little tense on my lower back. Form is important with this equipment. After I used it with proper form it was a great workout. Its portable and quiet. I get home late from work so respecting the others in the building I like to keep the noise down. The handles are easy to put on and take off so storing it is really easy. The overall build is of great quality in my opinion and its unique design challenges a wide range of muscle groups without having to worry about it being unstable where you would hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Grim

customer_reviews.title: Must pick it and move to original start position
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Carvers, one for my son. With my Carver, when reversing direction to return to my start position, the spring locks up too early, resulting in the start position moving further away with each extension. Must pick it and move to original start position. Ordered a replacement, hoping that this is a one-time fluke. Really liked the workout that it provides, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: The spring is not really needed
customer_reviews.text: I am actually very happy with this and it really improves core strength, posture and flattens the stomach. However, this model has the spring and I think that adds nothing but weight, cost, and complexity to it. I think the less expensive one without the spring would be fine
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Ab Carver Pro
customer_reviews.text: Love this ab carver, you definitely feel the burn with this and yes it comes with the knee pads. Would recommend, my girl tried it and she's not in shape and she felt it after a try and wants me to buy her one.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Handles are loose by design. Spring rattles inside. Roller stops 10" short of original position on return. Overall not well-designed product. I returned it immediately. Not sure if there is a quality control issue but I can't imagine why this has so many good reviews. I'm gonna look for a different ab-roller on Amazon now... Any suggestions from those who experienced the same problems that I did?
customer_reviews.author: Rory Staunton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get started with
customer_reviews.text: This things awesome. I started seeing results after using it in the mornings for about 7-10 min and then the evenings 7-10 min. Since I hadn't worked out in a while it did burn my lower abs and caused some soreness the first few weeks. I have also been able to extend farther in my workouts now and I feel a little better about myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning it worked fine, and I loved it. After a month of use (2-3 times a week), it started to make a clicking sound and tension comes and goes. Something definitely is wrong inside. I tried contacting support but they ignored (maybe because I'm not from the USA...). Bttm line - don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Lior

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro ★★★★★ from Amazon Customer on March 10, 2017 Great addition to My Home Gym This was EXACTLY what I was looking for to add to my home gym. I live in a 2 bedroom apartment, and was looking for exercise equipment that would be lightweight, and durable. Thankfully I came across apartmentworkouts.com review of the Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro. The wheel rolls without any problem on any surface(yes, even fluffy carpet). I am now doing sets of 20 rolls, and I can actually see a six-pack starting to form!! I'm so excited. I definitely recommend this product for anybody serious about trying to tone their stomach. Photo-worthy six pack here I come!!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Workout
customer_reviews.text: This ab carver will make you realize how little core strength you have when you first start using it. It does an excellent job of isolating the core muscles to give you an intense and targeted workout in little time. The results have been amazing and the quality of the product is great. It has never broken or shown signs of excessive wear.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! By far the best ab workout I have encountered with immediate results (feel my obliques and ab's burn) after first use. In one weeks time I feel the muscles becomeimg defined and achieving results quickly. Like this device much more than standard sit ups. The rebound system works great and I am 225 lbs., which made me skeptical if it would actually work with my mass. This product along with the T-Grip [...] travel kit gives me the mobility to keep a full workout everyday as I travel frequently. I also like the fact that that along with my other workout equipment the inventor is a person who knows what they are doing and have a solid background!
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: I'm excited, just ordered the pro.. been ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited,just ordered the pro..been using the gold version made by someone else..got ripped abs using that one..lm 56 years old will report back with my new review in around 1st week of September..I'll be serious about use .......Ok it's September 22, first day of fall,the results are awesome,ripped abs,plus I lost body fat ,I'm around 15 % pretty cool huh,,I was on a simply diet since April 29,2016, 25 pounds I recommend this product every other day just 3 sets of 20 straight out till your chin almost hits the floor,,,,I'm a ab roller for life very cool product
customer_reviews.author: craig gustin

customer_reviews.title: Great ab roller
customer_reviews.text: I have used two types before, one with no internal spring and one with internal spring but not curved. The internal spring really helps, even for an advanced user going fully extended. It adds resistance to help build muscle but it doesn’t feel like it’s straining my back to come back up. The curved sides are great, it allows rolling to the side to focus more on each side muscles. And the handles are very comfortable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Having the spring helps returning to from ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Having the spring helps returning to from stretched out and in doing so allows me to stretch much further than I would be able to otherwise - increasing the workout. The handles are comfortable and the wide base provides more stability - again letting you focus more on stretching out and working the abs. The beveled sides make for a nice transition to the sides to work my love handles. Glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Received USED item
customer_reviews.text: This product came used. I spent money for a brand new roller and received a used one. This is not acceptable, especially with this coronavirus epidemic, the last thing I want is used exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item less than a week ago. As of today, it already started messing up to me(getting partially stuck half way through a rep). Loved it for the first 5 days but I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swasey

customer_reviews.title: A great way to activate your rectus abdominis
customer_reviews.text: A very innovative design. You'll get resistance via spring widing while you extend with this ab roller and assists you while your way up. Also, pay attention to the signs on the item. This thing rolls in only one direction you and might end up breaking it if you roll out in the opposite direction.
customer_reviews.author: Subhash H J

customer_reviews.title: Offers no noticeable resistance as claimed
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the large number of positive reviews. 1) Offers no noticeable resistance as claimed 2) During the roll backwards, the roller locks up. 3) I don't get the 2 piece knee pad either. Why not offer a one piece pad like a lot of other rollers? I bought a double wheeled roller bundle from Amazon for about $10 less. I'm getting a better ab workout with this roller + included was a solid one piece knee pad, 2 floor sliders and a jump rope.
customer_reviews.author: Gear Guy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to sell
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to use. Not sure if it’s because my wife and I are a bit out of shape, or just the design of the product... I’m going with the later of the two, lol. I think if your serious about getting in shape, there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Angevine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro Roller for Core Workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is better version i guessed, unlike the previous ones that have a problem in material used and the make of it. The one i have i believed is the improved version and it is really good. Works as described, you feel the burn on your core if you use it properly and or as instructed/described by this product. Plus it has this knee pad. i am hoping that the spring inside will last. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MonJ

customer_reviews.title: It's doing something!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 months. I feel like it's helping my upper core and shoulders the most. I have noticed that I am sitting up more at my computer desk and when I walk down the street it feels like my posture is more erect. START SLOW. Do not go gong ho and hurt yourself. The knee pads are not that useful I went to Home Depot and got some foam tiles (use smooth side). I also face a wall so I can control how far I go forward. Once again START SLOW, do not try to stretch out all the way at first.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONYTWASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Range decrease in long series is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Roller decreases range after each full extension. User needs to accommodate the starting point ( close to the knees) after 5 extensions. It gets frustrating. I typically do 3to 4x of 25 extensions. Constant position reset doesn’t allow smooth use.
customer_reviews.author: Catala

customer_reviews.title: So Good and it Does Not Hurt
customer_reviews.text: Hello Jan 31 2019 Waist 45+ March 3 2019 Waist 40 Need I say More OK 30 reps a day Slow and Easy With Extended Stretch Just Like "Destructions" THIS WILL DESTROY YOUR ABDOMEN Also Lost 35 POUNDS Yes 35 with a Moderate WORKOUT
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise to tone abs.
customer_reviews.text: This will shred your abs! It's not for the faint of heart. Once your used to it you can do anything, do to much at first and it will seriously hurt you. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Ravenrose

customer_reviews.title: ... this wrong or what but it hurt my back terribly. First of all it doesn't come with instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I was just using this wrong or what but it hurt my back terribly . First of all it doesn't come with instructions on how to use , and I know it's pretty self explanatory , but still if you aren't into fitness you could really hurt yourself . I watched a YouTube video on how to use. Second of all I believe mine was broken because it wasn't rolling back as easily as I saw in the YouTube video , and it was same model and make . Anyway I gave it a good 2 months , yes results were there but the pain it was triggering in my back was not worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Ciocoitei

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: Pros I really like the shape of the wheel and the added lateral functionality it allows. The grips are a big improvement over the straight shaft type. Cons The spring tightening range is shorter than my reach so it stops rolling (locks up) on the return. That's annoying to the point of making it useless. Having used other ab rollers my first observation is the spring in this one does little to nothing in terms of helping you return. That's fine because the type of intended help defeats the purpose of using it. I wish I could get this wheel and grips without the annoying spring.
customer_reviews.author: VB Professor

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ab device but I feel if you could tighten ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ab device but I feel if you could tighten the spring inside it would work better for most people. I can see how someone could improve the design of this machine just by adding a small turn switch that would turn the inside spring for more tension then weaker individuals like someone who is 75 years old could use this to improve core strength. You have to have some decent core strength to use this machine. Someone who has no experience using a ab machine at all and has never worked their abs before will have some difficulty using this machine as indicated by the booklet included with the device.
customer_reviews.author: James Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it says. The item is well built and its harder to use than what it looks like. It really does work out your core and those abs. My first day of use it was intense, the next day my abs hurt like crazy. It also works out your arms really well. I stop using it because I got lazy, but I could feel the results from day one.
customer_reviews.author: jav818

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use and very motivating
customer_reviews.text: easy set up and use with results you can see without having to do 1,000 situps! only concern is you have to "unwind" the wheel after 8-10 reps as the spring doesn't fully unwind if you fully extend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by fellow cyclist
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. I am a cyclist, so core strength is a good thing. I bought it after another cyclist told me I needed to get it. My wife is even using it. It seems to work. After a couple of weeks, I have only worked up to about 6 reps of really laying out flat before returning. Even so, if I try to use it the very next day, I am too sore to go all the way out. Not sure how long it will take me to get to 10 straight out, 10 to the right, and 10 to the left like my buddy does. However, I plan to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what I would think about this but wanted to try it based on the other reviews. it is easy to use, and while you will certainly feel it, the spring offers a nice bit of support when going back to the starting position. If you use it as directed, you will feel the burn.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Granted I still have a great deal of 'belly fat" to work off before I ...
customer_reviews.text: First time there was an exercise program I can stick with. Just completed the 21 day program at beginner level and am moving on to the next cycle. The carver seems to be working well for me. Granted I still have a great deal of 'belly fat" to work off before I can see the abs. However, just be sticking with the program I managed to lose 10 lbs in the first 21 days . Although, it is not designed as a weight loss device of program the fact I can stick with it is helping me lose the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Victor John E Vale

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Truly worth getting over a conventional ab wheel. The spring assistance makes it easier to use perfect form, takes strain off the lower back, and allows you to do more reps. If you find it's not as challenging as a standard ab wheel, just roll out from a standing position instead of from your knees. Overall, it's a small price to pay for a piece of sturdy equipment that will honestly get you shredded if you just keep at it and don't give up
customer_reviews.author: James Flint

customer_reviews.title: Little effort for a great workout
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ab workout. It has left me sore after only doing 20 reps per day. I get up in the morning, do 10, come home, do 10 more. That's it. As simple as that! The knee pads are actually comfortable, though they look very thin. As for the roller itself, there's a spring inside it that helps you get back to your starting position, with a little break that reminds you when to start again. I love that. It takes all of the guess work out of working out. Small. Portable. Effective. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: EverybodyLovesKittens

customer_reviews.title: Good Workout
customer_reviews.text: Good workout. You definitely feel the core and arms burning after a while. Back can tend to hurt after prolonged use. Fun to use though! Reason for 4 stars: hire someone who can catch typos on the box before you sell the product :]
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Ahumada

customer_reviews.title: Another great product
customer_reviews.text: Great products from Perfect Fitness. Simple and smart redesigns to common products. The wide wheel and tension with the ergonomic handles almost make you forget middle school punishments.
customer_reviews.author: travis langlois

customer_reviews.title: This product is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This device is a little more expensive than other "bare bones" products but the extra cost is worth it. I realized that the included knee pads were very useful after initially using the roller without them. And, the assistance the device provides on the way back up is a nice feature that you won't find on a simpler product. I am glad I choose this project and not the cheapest, simplest product that is available.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Help Posture - Anterior Pelvic Tilt
customer_reviews.text: This product is really great. If you are trying to fix poor posture due to Anterior Pelvic Tilt, this device works the exact part of your abs that need to be strengthened. Doing sit ups actually makes the problem worse. So I bought the device to target the specific part of abs that needed strengthening and my abs hurt for days after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gayle

customer_reviews.title: but many reviews and fitness sites recommended it. It really works well and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I bought this, but many reviews and fitness sites recommended it. It really works well and you can see/feel the results. The ability to target the entire core is great and it is a lot more fun/challenging than sit-ups and/or crunches.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great at roller for great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Mine does sound like there is some grinding noises goin on inside, but it’s functionality is just fine 1 month in. Made by the same company as those perfect push up handles that came out in the 2000s.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: 2" Gone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 1 month and have definitely noticed a big difference. I did, however, have to visit YouTube.com for some help with the correct technique. I have lost 2 inches around my belly and the muscles in other places on my core have tightened as well.
customer_reviews.author: LaLadyBug40

customer_reviews.title: works. if you want abs and are dedicated, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this works. never in my life have I had "abs." after switching to a low carb/keto diet and using this for about 5 weeks, abs were there. amazing. very tough the first week. it gets easier the more you use it. amazing the workout your abs get beyond what you can do with situps, crunchess, and leg lifts. your upper body seems to get a bit of workout from this too (not just abs). to even see abs, you have to get your body fat percentage down to around 14% or lower. so even if you strengthen your abs, you wont see them without the diet portion also.fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Dude

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, but this product deserves it. I've had this thing for years and only worked out at home here and there, but I've had good results with it each time and I can really tell it hits your core well... and not just some of your core. Also, it is one of the best devices for avoiding back pain while working your abs. Tip: You can start your roll a little back from where you would (tucking it in toward your knees instead of where you would start) in order to get more resistance. This gives you some flexibility in how many reps you'll be able to do, etc. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: it makes a lot of strange noises like a spring is shifting
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but has a few problems that should be corrected. First, it makes a lot of strange noises like a spring is shifting. I hope it doesn't pop out. The other issue is that as you roll it back and forth, it won't come back to you, so you must reset it. Another issue is the the handles are not comfortable for me, but that may vary from person to person. Bottom line - I'm not impressed. It could be so much more if these items were corrected.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Deshong Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice for an ab workout.
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller provides one of the best ab workouts I have experienced and the springs help you on the way up in order to get the full exercise. The big circular stickers on the sides are falling off a bit but the rest of the roller is very well constructed. The wide handles make for stable movement out and back and a suggested workout plan is provided with the roller. They recommend rolling out to each side which I didn't find to be quite as effective as straight out and back but overall, this is a solid choice for an ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Simple Ab Exercises in Your Own Home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ab roller! I used one at our gym and it killed my hands. The wheel was wobbly and gave too much resistance. This Ab Carver is very smooth and allows you to do ab workouts safely. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this baby. My only gripe is that the range of motion is about six inches TOO SHORT when extending your body to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Panski

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a trip to ER for palpation
customer_reviews.text: it does everything it suppose to do u really can feel ur abs getting tight i lost ten pounds in two weeks im 50yrs old and out of shape,
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: More stable than my inexpensive wheel
customer_reviews.text: I can go out farther and hold it longer than with my other wheel that does not have an assist to return to start position. The wider wheel is nice creating more stability too. It is heavier and not an item I will pack for trips, but one I am using and enjoy using at home.
customer_reviews.author: brystler

customer_reviews.title: Really works. I started seeing results in a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Really works. I started seeing results in a week. My stance is straight, no more slumping and I lose that upper back fat. Buy it, buy it, buy it. It's worth every pennies
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion Matters

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This Ab roller is extremely durable, easy to use, quick assembly, and Has an excellent spring feature that assist with guiding you back to your original position . I previously brought a cheaper version and quickly realized that I was wasting my money and time on that device. I am totally satisfied with this premium brand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and is able to withstand some hefty weight. I weigh 198 lbs and was a bit worried this would cave under my weight. I was pleasantly surprised at how stable it felt. I really liked how the wider wheel made it easier for my fiancé and I to maneuver since we are beginner users. It comes with knee pads that are nice and are a decent thickness. One thing to keep in mind is that you have to be careful to not do sudden yanking motions as there is a spring inside of the roller that can rebound hard.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Item supports me (6'2, 240 Ibs). What I really like about this item is the interior spring assists you back from the prone position. Which is great to reduce the chance of back injury, as oppose to other less quality ab rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The best assisted roller
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back pain that does not allow me to exercise daily. This ab roller relieves enough pain to continue my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of which "Ab Ripper" to purchase and came across this one in my search. The large wheels seemed like they would make this product easy to use and allow me for more range of motion. After receiving and using this product multiple times, I can say that I am extremely happy with my purchase. This "Ab Carver" is extremely easy to use, even for someone who might not have the strongest core. The large wheels make balancing easy and allow for a wide range of motion, working different muscles with each turn.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Fitness
customer_reviews.text: not bad. The workmanship of the product is good. The smoothness is also very good. My abs depends on it.
customer_reviews.author: dan dan zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works very well. It is not travel size so if you're looking to bring it on trips go with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since the original ab roller, this thing makes it better. High quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: The ab roller got better and this is it. The handles are perfectly positioned and the item is very sturdy made of high-quality materials. This is something that’s going to last. It definitely cost more, but you’ll be happy when you see the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: A few reps a day is all you need!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I’m only sad that when I go away for long work trips I can’t take it with me, because it’s such a fantastic ab workout. Make sure your plank is correct so you don’t injure your back - that’s probably the most important thing with any ab roller I’m general.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing , comes with a general instruction of how and what positions are to be done with it, definitely felt a difference after using it a few times. Ive had a few of these in the past and this is the only one that has held up over time. Very solid ,well built, easy to pull out when your watching tv or just waking up . Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Luz O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Big wheel so yuo can roll to the sides with ease. I tried a couple of others on here that you had to put together and I returned them both, all you have to do with this one is pop in handles and go
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: No pain, no gain. Initially this will bust your b***t. But that's what is is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: the equipment is easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: Add me to the sold list. I received the product on 1/19/17. First off no assembly required, unless you are unable to slide some handles into slots. Second, while it sounds cliche, the equipment is easy to use and fun. No really, I have actually enjoyed using the machine. Third, my abs are already sore and I have only used it twice in five days. And we're not talking about the owe my abs hurt and I can't move sore. More the my abs are tighter type of sore. So I like it. That's my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Schein

customer_reviews.title: I love this ab roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this ab roller. I've never used one before so I don't have much to compare it to, but I'm happy with my purchase. This workout is no joke! I had my doubts, but wanted to try something I could do at home. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: it performs well and is one of the better wheels out there
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely overpriced and it breaks even after just normal use every two years. I will now have to buy my third wheel because of this 2 year lifespan. However, while it lasts, it performs well and is one of the better wheels out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.   Carl    Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Does not return to the starting point - possible slipping spring?
customer_reviews.text: The roller will not roll back to the starting point, but stops rolling at about an inch ahead of the starting point. The spring clicks during the forward movement, which makes me wonder whether it's slipping inside.
customer_reviews.author: hacksaw

customer_reviews.title: It works as it is supposed to, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complaints. It works perfectly and I am seeing my abs showing up just in few weeks after using it for several times per day.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well built ab roller
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller is remarkable! I brought one to my gym for all to use over two years ago and it still works and looks almost new with just for a few scratches on the wheel. The people in the gym love it and it gets plenty of use. I have one at home and I also gave one to a friend. It’s very sturdy and well made. It is also very easy to put together The arms easily snap on. You will feel the results of your ab workout after one session. Great for your core workout.
customer_reviews.author: DB APN

customer_reviews.title: Well made, handles like cape buffalo, abdominal area hurts a lot now (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: I think this is pretty awesome. It's well made, very sturdy and much better than the ones they sold in the 60's/70's that looked like a wagon wheel. I've only been using it for a few weeks but I can tell it's working muscles that haven't been worked in a long time! As long as it lasts (time will tell) I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoyChicago

customer_reviews.title: Roll Your Way Into A Six-Pack
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as it's name says. Easy to assemble, works great on all floors. The wheel is wide and very stable but the handles can take a toll on your wrists after several sets. Definitely have to build up your core muscles before being able to fully extend and return to your starting position, but your abs will let you know if you are doing the exercise correctly. You will feel the burn and notice a difference the more you use it. Great addition to any exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: Gem2win

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality ab roller
customer_reviews.text: You get out of it what you put into it. Pay attention to directions and use the provided knee pad to get your best results. Got this on a lightning deal, so I got more than my money's worth as this is a higher quality ab roller.
customer_reviews.author: GMR

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This seemingly simple device is so great! Without needing any large amount of space you can use this anywhere. Handles are so much more comfortable compared w similar models w just a bar and two hand grips. It doesn’t take too long to master the use of this.
customer_reviews.author: chanko

customer_reviews.title: You still have to do the work
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made with high quality. It rolls nicely and the handles are nicely made to fit your hands. I put this thing to use pretty hard for about 6 weeks so far and its holding up just like day one. I'm definitely noticing more fit abs
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Isolation is great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after seeing a few people use it at the gym. One guy let me try it at the gym and told me he purchased it on Amazon. I really like the way it isolates the abs and is less stressful on the shoulders than the old school single wheel type.
customer_reviews.author: JSmithJr

customer_reviews.title: Abdominal toning target tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate abdominal exercise. The first time that I used it, I thought that I would be able to complete the task with ease, I was wrong. I was able to do about 4 reps. I did not realize how weak my stomach muscles had become. Now I am able to do my exercise routine. Everyday gets a little easier but, I can still feel the burn and see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: The ab roller actually helps you pull back nad take strain off you stomach and back. It is a well made machine and it is easy to use, and you will feel it the first time that you use it. Appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Deliver what it promises
customer_reviews.text: It makes my abs works, easy to start using it, really loved the product. Great quality, I am 230 pounds and I've being using it a lot, no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend by a friend. This is much more effective exercise then sit-ups and ab machines in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Liu Xiao

customer_reviews.title: I have this and the non-pro and I actually prefer ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this and the non-pro and I actually prefer the non-pro. I'm not a fan of the spring loaded assist and there's no way to disable it. Overall, it's a very well made product that works very well, as long as you have use for the spring loaded assist. If your core is strong enough to where you don't need it, you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: ZX

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. I like the hard stop motion which makes you work harder
customer_reviews.text: The hard stop in roll on extension was a surprise but it forces more stability work... The control is not hard..but doing multiple rolls will get harder and target well if doing properly. Didn't think it would be ao interesting until I actually worked it
customer_reviews.author: JudieeK

product_meta.title: Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro Roller for Core Workouts
product_meta.description: The Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro is an ab roller with built in resistance to help maximize muscle growth and definition in abdominals and arms. A kinetic engine, comprised of a durable carbon steel spring, offers resistance on the roll out and assistance on the roll back to amplify ab and arm workouts. Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro features an ultra wide wheel tread that increases stability when carving left or right to work obliques. Ergonomic hand grips are angled to help activate arm and core muscles; handles are removable for easy storage and transport. Durable, high density foam knee pads are included for superior comfort while carving. Downloadable 21 day Perfect Fitness Ab Carver Pro workout plan also included. 1 year manufacturer .
feature_bullets: Ultra wide ab roller with built in resistance and ergonomic handles to help maximize results of ab roll out exercises
Interior kinetic engine uses a carbon steel spring to provide resistance and  amplify abdominal and arm workout
Ultra wide wheel tread offers  stability when carving left, right or center for targeted work on obliques.DO NOT use if you are over 300 lbs
Ergonomic hand grips are angled to activate arm and core muscles; Handles are removable for easy storage and transport
Includes high density foam kneepad for superior comfort; Downloadable 21 day workout plan; 1year manufacturer warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
